root: ^After defeating thralls, go to help Pëtr
^Pëtr asks you to get him some blood from the fallen enemies
^Pëtr bites and drains an corpse and teaches player bite ability
^Pëtr thanks you for your help and says that your an unfamiliar face and if you too are fighting against the Abattoir
^Pëtr says you seem like a strong fighter and if you want to learn more you should go to the bar and tell the bartender the passcode
